text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1948 Final was the 46th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Chamartín in Madrid, on 4 July 1948, being won by Sevilla CF, who beat RC Celta de Vigo 4–1. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Sevilla CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| José María Busto |- |DF ||2|| Joaquín (c) |- |DF ||3|| Manuel Belmonte |- |MF ||4|| Pedro Alconero |- |MF ||5|| Francisco Antúnez |- |MF ||6|| Pedro Eguiluz |- |FW ||7|| José Pineda |- |FW ||8|| Juan Arza |- |FW ||9|| Mariano |- |FW||10|| Manuel Doménech |- |FW||11|| José Campos |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Patricio Caicedo |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|RC Celta de Vigo: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Francisco Simón |- |DF ||2|| José Mesa |- |DF ||3|| Cabiño |- |MF ||4|| Gaitos |- |MF ||5|| Gabriel Alonso |- |MF ||6|| Yayo |- |FW ||7|| Francisco Roig (c) |- |FW ||8|| Miguel Muñoz |- |FW ||9|| Pahiño |- |FW||10|| Juan Areitio |- |FW||11|| Juan Vázquez |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Ricardo Zamora |- |} |} ==References== 1948 Copa Category:Sevilla FC matches Category:RC Celta de Vigo matches
title: 1948 Copa del Generalísimo Final
